author: Andrew Beaton
title: How the Expansion Vegas Golden Knights Reached the Stanley Cup Finals
text:
There’s an inescapable question hanging over the Stanley Cup Finals. It’s equal parts absurd, confounding and magical. And it’s definitely not simple. That’s because there’s nothing simple about something that’s unprecedented.
How did the Vegas Golden Knights get to the Stanley Cup Finals?
This is not supposed to happen. The Knights are an...
